Params: {2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We split up. We can blow this place to pieces using the explosives that I brought with me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "You do realize that there's a nuclear fusion reactor below, right?", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Then Liv, let's begin calculating the location and explosive equivalent.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Looks like we're on the same team.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "You should thank your makers for your luck! Nanami's a killer queen when it comes to fighting!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hmmmmmm? What? What did Nanami do to scare your socks off?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Have you forgotten...? You\'ve "practiced" with me for no less than three times.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "And your frequent harassments to our camp as well. There weren't any sizable losses, but you've been doing a number to the psychological conditions of our people..."}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'You meanâ€”the times that Nanami went to observe Forsaken lifestyle, Forsaken food, Forsaken breathing, and Forsaken culture in general?'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You call those things you did observation?'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "And don't forget that Nanami left you all tons of artwork as tokens of friendship!"}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The mess you made with your chainsaw and boosters... They were nothing but "Nanami was here" graffiti.'}
